document.full_text: european clearinghouse lch.clearnet confirmed on saturday it has received a string of offers from exchange operators interested in pursuing some form of business tie-up but said talks were still at an early stage.
document.title: lch.clearnet confirms offers from exchanges
lines_and_colors: european clearinghouse lch.clearnet confirmed on saturday it has received a string of offers from exchange operators interested in pursuing some form of business tie-up but said talks were still at an early stage.
